## hash() function

Generate random float value from a vec2

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hash(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, p: PBShaderExp): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  p | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | random seed |

**Returns:**

any

random float value
